alert.note: Alert for Chariton; Linn; Macon; Randolph (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 02 at 1:59AM CDT until August 02 at 2:45AM CDT by NWS Kansas City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Pleasant Hill has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northern Randolph County in north central Missouri... Northeastern Chariton County in north central Missouri... Southeastern Linn County in north central Missouri... Southern Macon County in north central Missouri... * Until 245 AM CDT. * At 158 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Brookfield, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Moberly, Macon, Brookfield, Marceline, Huntsville, Bevier, Bucklin, Callao, Cairo, New Cambria, Jacksonville, Clifton Hill, Excello, Prairie Hill, Wien and Saint Catherine. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
